items.headline: Morgan Stanley expects Novo Nordisk Alzheimer trial to fail as it slashes rating
items.summary_en: Morgan Stanley analysts say a trial to test whether Novo Nordisk’s blockbuster weight-loss drug also will work against Alzheimer’s is likely to fail, as it set the most pessimistic target price forecast of any Wall Street bank on the Danish drugmaker.
